title: 3 and Out  - Vols Roll Tide + Weekend Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out  - Vols Roll Tide + Weekend Mailbag
description:
Heading into NFL Week 6, John starts with his reaction to Tennessee’s seismic upset of Nick Saban and Alabama in Knoxville, and if it can finally turn the Vols around. Then, he answers listener questions and empties out the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd #volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
